verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: When] [ARG0: President Trump] [V: ordered] [ARG1: the embassy] [ARG2: moved] , he did not address the day after . The decision was more about short - term political gain than long - term strategic advantage .
When President Trump ordered [ARG1: the embassy] [V: moved] , he did not address the day after . The decision was more about short - term political gain than long - term strategic advantage .
When President Trump ordered the embassy moved , he [V: did] not address the day after . The decision was more about short - term political gain than long - term strategic advantage .

When President Trump ordered the embassy moved , [ARG0: he] did [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: address] [ARGM-TMP: the day after] . The decision was more about short - term political gain than long - term strategic advantage .
When President Trump ordered the embassy moved , he did not address the day after . [ARG1: The decision] [V: was] [ARG2: more about short - term political gain than long - term strategic advantage] .
